description: In the conclusion of Lucas Entertainment’s “Barebackula,” Jonathan Harder (James Castle) must decide if he’s going to flee Castle Bare or if he’s going to give in to all of the sexual depravity taking place within. As Jonathan prepares to go, Barebackula (Damon Heart) makes him an offer he can’t refuse -- the eternal body and sex of Count Barebackula himself. And with such an offer, Barebackula will prove to Jonathan Harder that cum is life!
title: Barebackula Claims The Cum Of Jonathan Harder
